pages.text: $(major)Organic Matter/$ is a recipe ingredient used in the creation of $(l:geneticsresequenced:items/cell)Cells/$.$(br2)This is done in the $(l:geneticsresequenced:blocks/cell_analyzer)Cell Analyzer/$.

Each entity has its own Organic Matter, which can be processed into a $(l:geneticsresequenced:items/cell)Cell/$ of the entity's type.$(br2)You can see the Organic Matter's entity type in the item's tooltip.
